verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

Speak<WH1696> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> saying,<WH559> If<WH3588> a soul<WH5315> shall sin<WH2398> through ignorance<WH7684> against any<WH3605> of the commandments<WH4687> of the LORD<WH3068> concerning things which<WH834> ought not to be done,<WH6213> and shall do<WH6213> against any<WH259> of them:

If<WH518> the priest<WH3548> that is anointed<WH4899> do sin<WH2398> according to the sin<WH819> of the people;<WH5971> then let him bring<WH7126> for his sin,<WH2403> which<WH834> he has sinned,<WH2398> a young<WH1121> <WH1241> bullock<WH6499> without<WH8549> blemish<WH8549> to the LORD<WH3068> for a sin<WH2403> offering.

And he shall bring<WH935> the bullock<WH6499> to the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150> before<WH6440> the LORD;<WH3068> and shall lay<WH5564> his hand<WH3027> on the bullock's<WH6499> head,<WH7218> and kill<WH7819> the bullock<WH6499> before<WH6440> the LORD.<WH3068>
And the priest<WH3548> that is anointed<WH4899> shall take<WH3947> of the bullock's<WH6499> blood,<WH1818> and bring<WH935> it to the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation:<WH4150>

And the priest<WH3548> shall dip<WH2881> his finger<WH676> in the blood,<WH1818> and sprinkle<WH5137> of the blood<WH1818> seven<WH7651> times<WH6471> before<WH6440> the LORD,<WH3068> before<WH6440> the veil<WH6532> of the sanctuary.<WH6944>

And the priest<WH3548> shall put<WH5414> some of the blood<WH1818> on the horns<WH7161> of the altar<WH4196> of sweet<WH5561> incense<WH7004> before<WH6440> the LORD,<WH3068> which<WH834> is in the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation;<WH4150> and shall pour<WH8210> all<WH3605> the blood<WH1818> of the bullock<WH6499> at<WH413> the bottom<WH3247> of the altar<WH4196> of the burnt<WH5930> offering, which<WH834> is at the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation.<WH4150>

And he shall take<WH3318> off from it all<WH3605> the fat<WH2459> of the bullock<WH6499> for the sin<WH2403> offering; the fat<WH2459> that covers<WH3680> the inwards,<WH7130> and all<WH3605> the fat<WH2459> that is on the inwards,<WH7130>

And the two<WH8147> kidneys,<WH3629> and the fat<WH2459> that is on them, which<WH834> is by the flanks,<WH3689> and the lobe<WH3508> above<WH5921> the liver,<WH3516> with the kidneys,<WH3629> it shall he take<WH5493> away,

As it was taken<WH7311> off from the bullock<WH7794> of the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace<WH8002> offerings: and the priest<WH3548> shall burn<WH6999> them on the altar<WH4196> of the burnt<WH5930> offering.
And the skin<WH5785> of the bullock,<WH6499> and all<WH3605> his flesh,<WH1320> with his head,<WH7218> and with his legs,<WH3767> and his inwards,<WH7130> and his dung,<WH6569>

Even the whole<WH854> <WH3605> bullock<WH6499> shall he carry<WH3318> forth<WH3318> without<WH2351> the camp<WH4264> to a clean<WH2889> place,<WH4725> where<WH413> the ashes<WH1880> are poured<WH8211> out, and burn<WH8313> him on<WH5921> the wood<WH6086> with fire:<WH784> where<WH5921> the ashes<WH1880> are poured<WH8211> out shall he be burnt.<WH8313>

And if<WH518> the whole<WH3605> congregation<WH5712> of Israel<WH3478> sin<WH7686> through ignorance,<WH7686> and the thing<WH1697> be hid<WH5956> from the eyes<WH5869> of the assembly,<WH6951> and they have done<WH6213> somewhat against any<WH259> of the commandments<WH4687> of the LORD<WH3068> concerning things which<WH834> should not be done,<WH6213> and are guilty;<WH816>

When the sin,<WH2403> which<WH834> they have sinned<WH2398> against<WH5921> it, is known,<WH3045> then the congregation<WH6951> shall offer<WH7126> a young<WH1121> <WH1241> bullock<WH6499> for the sin,<WH2403> and bring<WH935> him before<WH6440> the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation.<WH4150>

And the elders<WH2205> of the congregation<WH5712> shall lay<WH5564> their hands<WH3027> on the head<WH7218> of the bullock<WH6499> before<WH6440> the LORD:<WH3068> and the bullock<WH6499> shall be killed<WH7819> before<WH6440> the LORD.<WH3068>
And the priest<WH3548> that is anointed<WH4899> shall bring<WH935> of the bullock's<WH6499> blood<WH1818> to the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation:<WH4150>

And the priest<WH3548> shall dip<WH2881> his finger<WH676> in some of the blood,<WH1818> and sprinkle<WH5137> it seven<WH7651> times<WH6471> before<WH6440> the LORD,<WH3068> even before<WH6440> the veil.<WH6532>

And he shall put<WH5414> some of the blood<WH1818> on the horns<WH7161> of the altar<WH4196> which<WH834> is before<WH6440> the LORD,<WH3068> that is in the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation,<WH4150> and shall pour<WH8210> out all<WH3605> the blood<WH1818> at<WH413> the bottom<WH3247> of the altar<WH4196> of the burnt<WH5930> offering, which<WH834> is at the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation.<WH4150>
And he shall take<WH7311> all<WH3605> his fat<WH2459> from him, and burn<WH6999> it on the altar.<WH4196>

And he shall do<WH6213> with the bullock<WH6499> as he did<WH6213> with the bullock<WH6499> for a sin<WH2403> offering, so<WH3651> shall he do<WH6213> with this: and the priest<WH3548> shall make an atonement<WH3722> for them, and it shall be forgiven<WH5545> them.

And he shall carry<WH3318> forth<WH3318> the bullock<WH6499> without<WH2351> the camp,<WH4264> and burn<WH8313> him as he burned<WH8313> the first<WH7223> bullock:<WH6499> it is a sin<WH2403> offering for the congregation.<WH6951>

When<WH834> a ruler<WH5387> has sinned,<WH2398> and done<WH6213> somewhat through ignorance<WH7684> against any<WH259> of the commandments<WH4687> of the LORD<WH3068> his God<WH430> concerning things which<WH834> should not be done,<WH6213> and is guilty;<WH816>

Or<WH176> if his sin,<WH2403> wherein<WH834> he has sinned,<WH2398> come<WH3045> to his knowledge;<WH3045> he shall bring<WH935> his offering,<WH7133> a kid<WH8163> of the goats,<WH5795> a male<WH2145> without<WH8549> blemish:<WH8549>

And he shall lay<WH5564> his hand<WH3027> on the head<WH7218> of the goat,<WH8163> and kill<WH7819> it in the place<WH4725> where<WH834> they kill<WH7819> the burnt<WH5930> offering before<WH6440> the LORD:<WH3068> it is a sin<WH2403> offering.

And the priest<WH3548> shall take<WH3947> of the blood<WH1818> of the sin<WH2403> offering with his finger,<WH676> and put<WH5414> it on the horns<WH7161> of the altar<WH4196> of burnt<WH5930> offering, and shall pour<WH8210> out his blood<WH1818> at<WH413> the bottom<WH3247> of the altar<WH4196> of burnt<WH5930> offering.

And he shall burn<WH6999> all<WH3605> his fat<WH2459> on the altar,<WH4196> as the fat<WH2459> of the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace<WH8002> offerings: and the priest<WH3548> shall make an atonement<WH3722> for him as concerning his sin,<WH2403> and it shall be forgiven<WH5545> him.

And if<WH518> any<WH5315> one<WH5315> of the common<WH776> people<WH5971> sin<WH2398> through ignorance,<WH7684> while he does<WH6213> somewhat against any<WH259> of the commandments<WH4687> of the LORD<WH3068> concerning things which<WH834> ought not to be done,<WH6213> and be guilty;<WH816>

Or<WH176> if<WH176> his sin,<WH2403> which<WH834> he has sinned,<WH2398> come<WH3045> to his knowledge:<WH3045> then he shall bring<WH935> his offering,<WH7133> a kid<WH8166> of the goats,<WH5795> a female<WH5347> without<WH8549> blemish,<WH8549> for his sin<WH2403> which<WH834> he has sinned.<WH2398>
And he shall lay<WH5564> his hand<WH3027> on the head<WH7218> of the sin<WH2403> offering, and slay<WH7819> the sin<WH2403> offering in the place<WH4725> of the burnt<WH5930> offering.

And the priest<WH3548> shall take<WH3947> of the blood<WH1818> thereof with his finger,<WH676> and put<WH5414> it on the horns<WH7161> of the altar<WH4196> of burnt<WH5930> offering, and shall pour<WH8210> out all<WH3605> the blood<WH1818> thereof at<WH413> the bottom<WH3247> of the altar.<WH4196>

And he shall take<WH5493> away all<WH3605> the fat<WH2459> thereof, as the fat<WH2459> is taken<WH7311> away from off the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace<WH8002> offerings; and the priest<WH3548> shall burn<WH6999> it on the altar<WH4196> for a sweet<WH5207> smell<WH7381> to the LORD;<WH3068> and the priest<WH3548> shall make an atonement<WH3722> for him, and it shall be forgiven<WH5545> him.
And if<WH518> he bring<WH935> a lamb<WH3532> for a sin<WH2403> offering,<WH7133> he shall bring<WH935> it a female<WH5347> without<WH8549> blemish.<WH8549>

And he shall lay<WH5564> his hand<WH3027> on the head<WH7218> of the sin<WH2403> offering, and slay<WH7819> it for a sin<WH2403> offering in the place<WH4725> where<WH834> they kill<WH7819> the burnt<WH5930> offering.

And the priest<WH3548> shall take<WH3947> of the blood<WH1818> of the sin<WH2403> offering with his finger,<WH676> and put<WH5414> it on the horns<WH7161> of the altar<WH4196> of burnt<WH5930> offering, and shall pour<WH8210> out all<WH3605> the blood<WH1818> thereof at<WH413> the bottom<WH3247> of the altar:<WH4196>

And he shall take<WH5493> away all<WH3605> the fat<WH2459> thereof, as the fat<WH2459> of the lamb<WH3775> is taken<WH7311> away from the sacrifice<WH2077> of the peace<WH8002> offerings; and the priest<WH3548> shall burn<WH6999> them on the altar,<WH4196> according<WH5921> to the offerings made by fire to the LORD:<WH3068> and the priest<WH3548> shall make an atonement<WH3722> for his sin<WH2403> that he has committed,<WH2398> and it shall be forgiven<WH5545> him.
